column4: diesel118=> as instructed in their site "sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ubuntu-wine/ppa"

alex_under08=> where or how would i find it?
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install wine
what version of ubuntu are you running?
als check in System > Administration > Software Sources and make sure universe is enabled
What version of ubuntu are you using?
click on Systme > Admin > Software Sources
make sure that universe is checkboxed
was it unchecked before?
okay now you should be able to just sudo apt-get install wine in a terminal or you can use Applications > add/remove programs to install the wine package.
or synaptic
the issue was the repository where wine is located wasn't enabled
=> it worked like  a charm, thx a bunch!!!
there are plenty of them. If you search the software center you will get many results
